mapper.select: SELECT cart_item_no cartItemNo, p.product_no productNo, product_price productPrice, product_name productName, product_simple_content productSimpleContent, product_img_new_name productImgNewName, cart_item_count cartItemCount, cart_item_total_price cartItemTotalPrice, CASE WHEN (DATEDIFF(product_deadline, NOW()) < 14) THEN (cart_item_total_price / 2) ELSE cart_item_total_price END AS cartItemDiscountPrice FROM (SELECT cart_item_no, product_no, cart_item_count, cart_item_total_price FROM cart_items WHERE cart_no = #{cartNo} AND cart_item_state = 0) ci, product_imgs pi, products p WHERE ci.product_no = pi.product_no AND pi.product_no = p.product_no;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_items (product_no, cart_no, cart_item_count, cart_item_total_price, cart_item_state) VALUES ( #{productNo}, #{cartNo}, #{cartItemCount}, (SELECT product_price FROM products WHERE product_no = #{productNo}) * #{cartItemCount}, 0)
